data.text: @Frannymummy @EnemyInAState You star! Hope you and your family get well soon x
@Foxes_Garden @EnemyInAState Already done.  Thank you so much ❤️☺️
@Frannymummy @EnemyInAState Good move! Maybe share the link with the school? They'll be telling all parents to send their kids in and some won't question it.
@bunny_peculiar @EnemyInAState I will send it now.  Thank you ☺️
@Frannymummy @EnemyInAState You should send them a link to the guidance on the gov website- if they’re telling other parents to send Covid positive kids in that’s really bad news. And they’re wrong.
@doodoo1047 @JoeGrowling @EnemyInAState Probably dining out with BoJo and his cronies 🤦‍♀️
@Frannymummy @JoeGrowling @EnemyInAState Where are the health and safety executive
@Foxes_Garden @EnemyInAState Thank you.  I have already advised the school that my son will be staying home until he tests negative regardless of whether he is showing symptoms ☺️

@BlackGoo_ @EnemyInAState I think I may have the same idea, the world is completely screwed and the UK is beyond the point of repair thanks to our inept Government.

Thank you for the kind words, we are currently tucked up in bed watching TV ☺️
